description:
The Meltlan Destroyer is another sleek medium-scale warship with a prominently narrow and vertically structured hull. The counterpart to the Zentradi http://anidb.net/ch48783 [Thuverl-Salan] vessel, the Meltlan Destroyer is some 2,500 meters long and a primary combat vessel of the Meltlandi fleets.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macrossdyrl/meltran-destroyer.htm
name: Meltlan Destroyer
